languages.text: {n}Несмотря на множество кровоточащих ран, статный эльдар спокойно расправляет плечи и приподнимает тонкий подбородок, изучая вас проницательным взглядом. В изумрудных глазах ксеноса сияют отблески загадочных синих огней.{/n} "Мон-кай и Изгой оказались в сердце Темного города, чтобы спасти то, что осталось. Вселенная полна жестоких сюрпризов, но я сумел предвидеть этот исход".

traits.locale_text: {n}Несмотря на множество кровоточащих ран, статный эльдар спокойно расправляет плечи и приподнимает тонкий подбородок, изучая вас проницательным взглядом. В изумрудных глазах ксеноса сияют отблески загадочных синих огней.{/n} "Мон-кай и Изгой оказались в сердце Темного города, чтобы спасти то, что осталось. Вселенная полна жестоких сюрпризов, но я сумел предвидеть этот исход".

languages.text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately Aeldari calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на множество кровоточащих ран, статный эльдар спокойно расправляет плечи и приподнимает тонкий подбородок, изучая вас проницательным взглядом. В изумрудных глазах ксеноса сияют отблески загадочных синих огней.{/n} "Мон-кай и Изгой оказались в сердце Темного города, чтобы спасти то, что осталось. Вселенная полна жестоких сюрпризов, но я сумел предвидеть этот исход".

traits.locale_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his fine chin as he scrutinises you with his keen emerald-green eyes, in which mysterious blue lights are gleaming.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I have been able to foresee."

{n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his fine chin as he scrutinises you with his keen emerald-green eyes, in which mysterious blue lights are gleaming.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I have been able to foresee."

Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."

Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."

{n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately Aeldari calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."

languages.text: {n}Aunque sangra por numerosas heridas, el majestuoso Aeldari se yergue con calma y levanta su estrecha barbilla para escudriñarte con su penetrante mirada. Sus ojos de color verde esmeralda emiten misteriosos destellos de luz azul.{/n} «{mf|Un|Una} mon-keigh y una proscrita se han abierto paso hasta el corazón de la Ciudad Siniestra para salvar lo poco que queda. El universo está lleno de sorpresas crueles, pero al menos este desenlace sí lo pude vaticinar».
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately Aeldari calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aunque sangra por numerosas heridas, el majestuoso Aeldari se yergue con calma y levanta su estrecha barbilla para escudriñarte con su penetrante mirada. Sus ojos de color verde esmeralda emiten misteriosos destellos de luz azul.{/n} «{mf|Un|Una} mon-keigh y una proscrita se han abierto paso hasta el corazón de la Ciudad Siniestra para salvar lo poco que queda. El universo está lleno de sorpresas crueles, pero al menos este desenlace sí lo pude vaticinar».

languages.text: {n}体中から血を流しつつも、その風格あるアエルダリは静かに肩を正し、細いあごを上げ、鋭いまなざしであなたを見つめた。翠玉色の瞳に神秘的な青い光がきらめく。{/n} 「モン＝ケイと追放者が、わずかに残った者を救うために仄暗き都の中心部に潜り込むとはな。宇宙は残酷な驚きに満ちているが、この結果は私が予見していたものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately Aeldari calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."

traits.locale_text: {n}体中から血を流しつつも、その風格あるアエルダリは静かに肩を正し、細いあごを上げ、鋭いまなざしであなたを見つめた。翠玉色の瞳に神秘的な青い光がきらめく。{/n} 「モン＝ケイと追放者が、わずかに残った者を救うために仄暗き都の中心部に潜り込むとはな。宇宙は残酷な驚きに満ちているが、この結果は私が予見していたものだ」

languages.text: {n}尽管这个面貌威严的艾达灵族浑身布满了流血的伤口，但他仍然冷静地挺直了肩膀，抬起尖下巴，以敏锐的目光审视着你，翠绿色的眼睛里闪烁着神秘的蓝光。{/n}“猴子与流浪者在黑暗之城的中心找到了他们的道路，前来拯救寥寥无几的幸存者。宇宙真是充满了残酷的意外啊。”
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately Aeldari calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管这个面貌威严的艾达灵族浑身布满了流血的伤口，但他仍然冷静地挺直了肩膀，抬起尖下巴，以敏锐的目光审视着你，翠绿色的眼睛里闪烁着神秘的蓝光。{/n}“猴子与流浪者在黑暗之城的中心找到了他们的道路，前来拯救寥寥无几的幸存者。宇宙真是充满了残酷的意外啊。”

languages.text: {n}Malgré ses nombreuses plaies béantes, l'imposant Aeldari redresse calmement les épaules et lève son étroit menton pour vous lancer un regard aiguisé. De mystérieuses lueurs bleues animent ses yeux émeraude.{/n} « {mf|Un|Une} mon-keigh et une Errante se sont {mf|infiltrés|infiltrées} dans le cœur de la Cité Crépusculaire pour sauver le peu qu'il en reste. L'univers regorge de cruelles surprises, mais voilà un dénouement que j'avais vu venir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately Aeldari calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré ses nombreuses plaies béantes, l'imposant Aeldari redresse calmement les épaules et lève son étroit menton pour vous lancer un regard aiguisé. De mystérieuses lueurs bleues animent ses yeux émeraude.{/n} « {mf|Un|Une} mon-keigh et une Errante se sont {mf|infiltrés|infiltrées} dans le cœur de la Cité Crépusculaire pour sauver le peu qu'il en reste. L'univers regorge de cruelles surprises, mais voilà un dénouement que j'avais vu venir. »

languages.text: {n}Trotz seiner vielen blutenden Wunden richtet der stattliche Aeldari in Ruhe seine Schultern auf und mustert dich mit leicht erhobenem Kinn und klarem Blick. In seinen smaragdgrünen Augen schimmert ein geheimnisvolles blaues Licht.{/n} "{mf|Ein|Eine} Chem-Pan-Sey und eine Ausgestoßene haben sich auf den Weg ins Herz der Dunklen Stadt gemacht, um das Wenige zu retten, was noch geblieben ist. Das Universum steckt voller grausamer Überraschungen, aber ich hatte unser Treffen vorausgesehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately Aeldari calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz seiner vielen blutenden Wunden richtet der stattliche Aeldari in Ruhe seine Schultern auf und mustert dich mit leicht erhobenem Kinn und klarem Blick. In seinen smaragdgrünen Augen schimmert ein geheimnisvolles blaues Licht.{/n} "{mf|Ein|Eine} Chem-Pan-Sey und eine Ausgestoßene haben sich auf den Weg ins Herz der Dunklen Stadt gemacht, um das Wenige zu retten, was noch geblieben ist. Das Universum steckt voller grausamer Überraschungen, aber ich hatte unser Treffen vorausgesehen."

languages.text: {n}Gösterişli Aeldari, kanayıp duran yaralarına rağmen sakince dikleşiyor. Zeki bakışlarıyla seni incelerken dar çenesini kaldırıyor. Zümrüt yeşili gözlerinde esrarengiz mavi ışıklar parıldıyor.{/n} "Bir mon-keigh ile bir Yurtsuz, azıcık da olsa geriye kalan her şeyi kurtarmak için çıktıkları yolda kendilerini Kara Şehir'in merkezinde buldular. Evren gaddar sürprizlerle dolu olsa da bu neticeyi öngörmeyi başarmıştım."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite his many bleeding wounds, the stately Aeldari calmly straightens his shoulders and raises his narrow chin as he scrutinises you with his keen gaze. Mysterious blue lights glimmer in his emerald-green eyes.{/n} "A mon-keigh and an Outcast have found their way into the heart of the Dark City to save what little remains. The universe is full of cruel surprises, but this is an outcome I managed to foresee."

Zümrüt yeşili gözlerinde esrarengiz mavi ışıklar parıldıyor.{/n} "Bir mon-keigh ile bir Yurtsuz, azıcık da olsa geriye kalan her şeyi kurtarmak için çıktıkları yolda kendilerini Kara Şehir'in merkezinde buldular. Evren gaddar sürprizlerle dolu olsa da bu neticeyi öngörmeyi başarmıştım."
